name: Kiro
bio: Hi, I'm Kiro. I capture moments and stories through my lens. This journal is a collection of my visual ramblings â€” from everyday street corners to distant landscapes.
bio2: I believe that photography is not just about pressing the shutter, but about preserving the feeling of a fleeting moment. Whether it's the play of light in a quiet alley or the grandeur of a mountain range, I try to document it all.

gear.name: XF 100-400mm f/4.5-5.6 R LM OIS WR
